snippet: More than 220 flights were canceled in Frankfurt when flight attendants walked off the job for eight hours.
abstract: Lufthansa flight attendants walk off the job for eight hours at Germany's Frankfurt airport, causing the cancellation of more than 220 flights.
lead_paragraph: More than 220 flights were canceled in Frankfurt when flight attendants walked off the job for eight hours.

headline.seo: Strike by Lufthansa Attendants Grounds Flights
headline.main: Strike by Lufthansa Attendants Grounds Flights
headline.print_headline: Strike By Lufthansa Attendants Grounds Flights
